name: stream-csv-enhanced
description: stream-csv-enhanced is a collection of node.js 0.10 stream components for creating custom standard-compliant CSV processors, which requires a minimal memory footprint. It can parse CSV files far exceeding available memory. Even individual data items are streamed piece-wise. Streaming SAX-inspired event-based API is included as well.
author: Eugene Lazutkin <eugene.lazutkin@gmail.com> (http://lazutkin.com/)
